properties.entry: SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE AS BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_COUNT AS BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_RECOMMEND AS BOARD_RECOMMEND, B.USER_NO AS USER_NO, R.REPLY_COUNT AS REPLY_COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE,'MMDDHH24MI') BOARD_DATE, A.CHANGE_NAME AS CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.REF_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON B.USER_NO = R.REPLY_NO WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, B.USER_NO, REPLY_COUNT, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN REPLY R USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 AND TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE) > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1,'YYYYMMDDHH') AND STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_COUNT desc , Board_RECOMMEND desc
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NO, BOARD_TYPE) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO , REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ?, FILE_PATH = ?, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, USER_NO, m.NICKNAME, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER m using(user_no) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND b.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT USER_NO FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 5 ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL
SELECT BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y' AND @ LIKE ? ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_COUNT = BOARD_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
